function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective hospital isolation measures leading to a large number of undetected or ineffectively quarantined cases","Impact":"Overloading the medical system and leading to a large-scale outbreak","Mitigation":"Improving detection and quarantine measures, increasing the number of medical beds","Technologies":"Advanced testing and tracking technology, hospital management systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Shortage of medical beds","Impact":"Inability to accommodate patients, leading to a collapse of the medical system","Mitigation":"Increasing the number of medical beds, optimizing hospital resource allocation","Technologies":"Hospital management systems, predictive analytics for resource allocation","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government"},{"Description":"Challenges in achieving the required number of medical beds","Impact":"Inability to meet the demand for medical beds, impacting epidemic control","Mitigation":"Exploring alternative solutions such as temporary medical facilities, improving efficiency of existing facilities","Technologies":"Modular medical units, telehealth systems","People":"General population, healthcare planners","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government"}]}
